content.detailedDescription: Reports are missing on this site.  this is test not for research
content.summary: Test

content.detailedDescription:
Driving eastbound on highway 285 at 8,500 elevation in the colorado rockies, the sky was very blue and clear, towards the east (denver) i saw 4-5 light blue highway-like roads in the sky, that seemed to stretch out to infinity, 2 of the roads crossed and made a huge x, the other lanes were beside them. these roads were almost the same color of the sky -only 1 or 2 shades lighter than the surounding blue sky, the roads were stationary in the sky for about 40 seconds, while driivng i stared at the roads and then they began one by one to uniformly dissolve and the roads faded uniformly ino the sky-color.  the temperature outside was between 35*-45*.   

i saw these similar roads like these before (fall '12 same temp.) over the rockies but of course really didn't give them much thought, until i saw a history channel(?) show about water port hole tunnels (?) off the west coast of cuba, these were identical, that crossed and were road-like,  only these were in the sky !       thank you.
content.summary: Saw 4-5 highway-like trails crossing in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 7 at the time of the sighting. i was in a car with my parents pulling on to our street to come home when i had the feeling of being "watched". i looked out the window of the car on my right side and noticed an object in the sky. the object was dark in color and had blinking lights. the object turned slightly than traveled in a straight line. i was in that moment of shock/fear and could not speak. i continued to look at the object before entering my home. the object continued to travel in a straight line down my street. 

in the days shortly after i began hearing "weird" noises around my home. i was familiar with the noises that occurred in my home and these were not normal.
content.summary: Stereotypical ufo saucer shape; had blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: I lived in the 16th floor of a 30+ building, the apartment where i live looks toward the green way and truman high school. about 6 am i look out the window, clear morning and i could see a couple of miles out toward bay plaza shopping mall, i notice one orb of light decending toward the green way about 100 to 150 feet from my window. the orb was not producing a lot of light however it look like a solid mass. after a second i notice two more orbs moving toward the first one, one coming from the high school  the other from the building across the greenway. all orbs became one this about half way in the green way and move toward the bay plaza shopping mall, i lost contact about a 10 second later. this is not the first time i have notice orbs around areas where i lived. i have seen this type of orbs in, puerto rico, virginia, california, georgia and new york. i prefer if i this report stay anonymous. however i will be happy to answer any question via e-mail.
content.summary: Orbs descending toward greenway, became one and move toward bay plaza

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke to what i thought were my cats running about to open my eyes to see a small grey walking along side of my sofa i was sleeping on. i tried to sit up, speak and kick it, but was not able to. i felt scared but it was only for a few second then i fell asleep. i do remember saying to myself "i knew it!"


also in 1983 or 1984 i was told i was with child had ultrasound and there was a fetus. at about 3 or 4 months along i was bleeding and was told i was never pregnant after a second ultrasound. i just remember being saddened to have lost the child.
content.summary: Was standingn at  the end of my couch i awoke to ee it walking away from me

content.detailedDescription: On thursday 4/4/2014 i come out of the house at 6:am and walked to the north side of the house to walk my two dogs,meanwhile i take a look at the sky when i see this only light to the east,it caught my attention because it was emitting very very bright pulsating lights and even thou it was stationary i knew it was no star by any means,looking at it i could see only two colors red and white then i took my two dogs inside the house and came right out again with my car keys in hand looked up and lights still there,took my binoculars out of my car's trunk and with them i could see 5 distinctive color lights red,white,green,yellow and blue and that's when i got my cell phone and was able to capture a picture of it but it only came out white and rest of the colors did not.In the photo i can see a very bright object with a tail that shows to be less brighter than the object,after taking the photo i came inside the house to make coffee when on stove i came out again and the lights were gone,i looked at my watch and it was 6:22am,i would say what ever this thing was it stayed at same place for at list over 25 min.Now i have a feeling of this lights appearing again and my reaction when ever i come out of the house is to look up and see if is there.All i have said here is the truth to best best of my knowledge and have the picture to prove it.
content.summary: Stationary pulsating lights,close enough to take a photo with my cell phone.

content.detailedDescription:
From their site and google "the revolutionary wire and track-free motherboard 

current electronics are built with permanently soldered hardware, so they must be discarded when even just one component breaks or needs to be upgraded. inovatzia has developed a completely disruptive wire- and connection-free motherboard that allows for a vast number of components to be simultaneously interconnected and powered, giving it a multiplicity of potential applications. this manner of integrating components allows users to upgrade or replace faulty parts without the need for special instruments or tools. modules can be placed anywhere on the board to create the desired device without the need for electrical connectors. 

the new additions to their team are : gordon penington the former director for tommy hilfiger and advisor for apple, walter myers head consultant, habicht ceo and founder of several corporations. 
"

what's next ........
they are here since 1800's stan petrov the founder of inovatzia the "inventor" ! here since 1880's "petrov (1880 - unknown; graduate in dvm from berne and stuttgart)" today "stan moved to the usa at 20, ���. and without living family. only ten years later, stan is an american citizen, has gained a degree in biology, is in medical school, has submitted several articles to professional peer-reviewed journals, acted as a consultant to a biomedical device company"human like

2013-14 petrov is a medical student/inventor who has distinguished himself by his abilities in electronics, mechanics, and repair of medical instruments. stan moved to the usa at 20, ���. and without living family. only ten years later, stan is an american citizen, has gained a degree in biology, is in medical school, has submitted several articles to professional peer-reviewed journals, acted as a consultant to a biomedical device company, has been approached by another company wanting to develop and use one of his inventions, and has taught biomechanical and surgical techniques to physicians and professors. 
at the beginning of his third year in medical school, stan started a company to develop and market his first major medical invention, but when the stream of inventions continued to flow, it became necessary to start inovatzia, inc. which, besides producing medical inventions, also has divisions for automotive, home, electronics, apparel and software.

content.detailedDescription: We were celebrating our 20th wedding anniversary and all of the people that were there are all military personnel from the ranks of sgt to general after we finished dinner and talking for a while most of the people went out side for a smoke and we all spotted the object moving from the east to the west in a straight line after that it broke its flight path and moved to the 1 o clock postion very rapidly and we all saw the movement i called the nearest air force base here in nj which is mcguire  air force base to see if they had any thing on radar i spoke to the duty commander and then the wing commander and they said they had nothing airborne at the time we then called the local airport near us and asked them if they had any unknown radar traffic and they said they had a fast unknown bogey and lost it after that we called caldwell airport in caldwell nj and asked them if they had a radar blip on the unknown the person i spoke to said they had a large bogey and then it disappeared off the screen the object was about 3-4 times the size of a aircraft carrier it was huge it made a regular plane look like a tonka toy then the object moved very fast from the line to the other postion as i said before as a 1sg and all of the other people there saw it the general told me to call the afb and ask so i was under orders to make the call as of that time my wife and i had a visit from 2 air force officers and we were told not to say any thing if i wanted to ever get promoted again then last night about 6pm 2 men came to our home dressed in black suits and tried to force me in there own way that we never saw anything and if i wanted my family and i to stay safe ive been in the army  for 35 years and getting ready to retire i told them that they could not intimidate me in no way and that i would speak out about this incident i was then told to be careful.
content.summary: Object seen by 20 u.S. army  personnel while on porch

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear night and long after dark. i was returning home when i saw the craft over the road near my home, at the time i lived in the country with very few neighbors and my property was at the top of a hill overlooking a valley area. i was heading east and couldn't miss the ship, it was bright orange in color looking like the sun during sunset. i turned in my drive and drove to the top of the hill on my neighbors property to be able to keep watching it. one thing that i noticed is that it didn't cast light on the trees it went over even though it was quite bright. i don't remember the exact date but it was around 1995 or 1996 and good weather so had to be spring to early fall. i also remember the same craft was described as being sighted in texas 3 days later. 


 the date i had to enter is only due to being required to enter a date.
content.summary: I was returning home and saw the craft over the road, i pulled in my yard and on the neighbor's land which was the top on a hill and watched the craft till it dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on front porch looking at towards the west i saw a plane go over then i notice a big ball of red light towards the north i went inside to get my cam its a reg cam and no cell phone cam it lasted for bout 5mins or so than it vanish this is the first time i ever seen something like this ive seen other objects  b4 but nothing like this. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Bright big ball red light

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were traveling east on interstate 80 in early december of 1991 at about 9:20pm. we approached the section of i-80 just west of the area of sugerloaf, pa. the east and west bound lanes split and are separated by a tree lined hill. the road at this point is an uphill climb with the sugerloaf valley below and to the right. we noticed an object very high in the sky descending toward the mountain between rock glen road and tomhicken road. the angle of descent was approximately 60 degrees of angle from the horizon in an easterly direction and due south of our location. the object appeared as a redish-orange fireball. our initial opinion was we were seeing a meteor enter the earth's atmosphere and were excited that we may see it hit the earth. i had seen meteors in the past and typically the color was bright white or bright yellow and the speed is fast and steady. this object was between red and orange in color. it was when the object began to slow down in its decent that we realized this was not a meteor. the object came to a stop in its descent at an altitude of about 120 feet above the mountain top. the trees in this area are about 40 feet in height and the object was about three times the height of the trees from the ground. my best guess for its diameter is about 60 feet. the object then began traveling east along the mountain ridge for a good distance. we were traveling at about 60mph and i slowed to around 50mph to pace the object. it traveled parallel with us for about 8 minutes and then the object slowly descended behind the ridge toward tomhicken road (route 3020). my wife and i were in awe of what we just saw. 
the size, speed change and change in direction, in my opinion eliminate the possibilty of meteor, conventional aircraft, or aviation flares. i researched flares and found the average burn time about three minutes.  since we observed the object for about ten minutes total time and considering the change is direction and size, i do not believe it was a flare. there were no other aircraft visible in the imediate area. there were however, several other vehicles on the road that night and at least two slowed down as we had to observe the object.
content.summary: Red-orange fireball slows and changes direction of travel over sugerloaf.

content.detailedDescription: Low flying triangle observed.
content.summary: Low flying triangle

content.detailedDescription:
My co-worker's girlfriend had received a picture/text from one of her friends, of a sunset, she had taken in her hometown of delhi, ontario on approximately march 28, 2014.

apparently she hadn't noticed the object until she had looked at the photo later on.

my co-worker's girlfriend had come to show us at work because she knew her boyfriend and i were into ufos and such.

wow, we were shocked at how amazing this object looks!

i have been on your website and have heard your organization mentioned by others, so i felt inclined to share this neat photo with you.

i am sure you would have a better idea of what we are looking at. maybe just a lense issue on the camera, i don't know.

hopefully you can send me back some analysis as to what others in your organization think about it.

                                                    thank you,
                                                              greg
content.summary: Bright and glowing, with two rings, looked like chandelier, beams at top

content.detailedDescription: Estaba realizando trabajos de jardiner����a en un centro del opus dei, cercano al pueblo de ortigosa del monte - segovia. cercano al centro se encuentra una fabrica de patatas fritas, justo por encima de la fabrica y alrededores rondaba como cuatro o cinco esferas del tama����o de una rueda de cami����n cada una. el avistamiento durar����a como cuatro o cinco minutos, despu����s se perdi���� en la lejan����a. al mismo tiempo de este avistamiento, se pudo observar una luz brillante como si se reflejara el sol en una nave, la altura en la que parec����a encontrarse a simple vista pod����a ser como la misma en la que se encuentra la estaci����n orbital de la nasa. para ver su presencia hab����a que mirar al cielo muy pegado al sol, mi impresi����n es que la nave estaba en una posici����n t����ctica para no ser vista desde la ciudad de madrid, ya que desde madrid el sol impedir����a ver su presencia, sin embargo desde mi posici����n se pod����a notar su posici����n. esta nave ����nodriza? en la que estaba a gran altura se le pudo ver m����s de una hora, quiz����s dos o tres. las cuatro o cinco naves peque����as, seg����n sus maniobras, parec����a estar tomando informaci����n de la zona de alguna manera. hay otro avistamiento en fechas anteriores y que por su naturaleza la considero menos interesante. solo destacar que eran dos ovni a gran altura circulando en la noche en una ����nica direcci����n. mientras una lo hac����a en linea recta, el otro lo hac����a en forma de ese (s). a los pocos minutos de desaparecer de mi vista por tener obst����culos de viviendas, se pudo ver de nuevo en direcci����n contrar����a solo una nave en linea recta.
content.summary: Varios tamaã±o rueda camiã³n
content.locationName: Ortigosa del Monte, Castile and León

content.detailedDescription:
Several residents were disturbed by a loud roaring noise in the early morning and rushed outdoors to see a very low-flying object described as a "jumbo jet" painted red and white which appeared from the northeast, overflew the island, and departed on about a 175 true heading over the horizon. doors were clearly visible on the flying object and the noise was described as exceptionally loud.

it was suggested that this occurrence might be connected with the disappearance of malaysia airlines flight 370 from kuala lumpur which had occurred a few hours earlier that morning; however, analysis of the latter flight's presumed position seems to indicate that it could not have been in the area at the time. 

the incident occurred in an area where low-flying commercial aircraft are never seen, as there is no nearby airport out of which such an airplane could have operated. air traffic controllers in mal��, some 100 miles to the northeast, confirmed that no known commercial aircraft were operating in the area at the time. the description is inconsistent with any known military aircraft, and the behavior is anomalous for a large jet aircraft, which would have been expected to be at cruise altitude had it transited the area.

the object departed in the direction of addu island,but no one there reported observing it. the only land on the projected flight path beyond addu is the coast of antarctica, some 4,200 miles to the south (though the path would have passed close to two uninhabited islands enroute, grande terre and heard island.)

parallels are suggested with the scandinavian "ghost flier" sightings of 1933-34, which also involved sightings of detailed, realistic airplane-like objects in contexts where no known real aircraft could possibly have been.
content.summary: Sighting of jetliner-like object over maldive islands, as reported in media

content.detailedDescription: During a drive in the ocala national forest, we noticed an area of forest that had recently been cut and burned. as we drove by on the dirt road, something glinting caught our eye. we parked on the edge of the dirt road, walked to it and discovered a large area that had metal strips around it. as we looked at the area we then heard in the distance a noise that sounded like a mri machine.
content.summary: Noticed metal in a odd shape in ocala national forest

content.detailedDescription: Heard sound like jet going to hit house , my son yelling to me from back bedroom , all lights went out , could see some lights coming down power line which was right next to house, i went out side to front lawn other neighbors were looking out windows or on front porches, i was on front when i saw object rectangular in shape the size of a foot ball field come down the power lines circle over my head around neighborhood for about 45 minutes then travel back up power line raise up in air and disappeared , then the lights all came back on
content.summary: Heard sound like jet was going to hit house then all power went out

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house in salvo, nc,on hatteras island. it was april 2,2014,had been a beautiful day and was now a nice evening, about 9:30p.M. after dinner i went onto the deck to look at the stars. the milky way was visible, all the stars were out. i noticed mars rising over the ocean directly e of my house (it's the biggest, brightest and most red i've ever seen, right now) . a little further south, about the same height in the sky i saw a large red/orange orb.I watched it, trying to figure what it was ;too big for a star, not moving. then i noticed a second, exactly the same but apparently closer up the beach (they appeared not too far above the other houses). i thought they were chinese lanterns, at first;tourists sometimes set them loose.Then one of them blinked off, then the other. meither had made any movement, at all, before blinking out. seconds later,one blinked back on,then the other. i watched for a minute or two s they kept periodically going on or off,sometimes appearing further n or s. when i described it to friends, one friend told me he and two others had seen the exact dame thing 5 miles n over the beach the night before. two other friends witnessed the same about 6 or 7 years ago.
content.summary: Two orang/red orbs s of my house over the beach. they would independently blink off, then come back on, sometimes in different places.  the last time one was further w and higher in sky.

content.detailedDescription: As i sat "chilling" in my friends pickup truck with 2 other friends, 4 of us total. i noticed three green glowing orbs hovering above our townhouse community. the object or objects were very low to the ground, probably no more than 500 ft off of the ground. there was no noise from the craft and all we could make out were three distinct glowing orbs, each orb made up one corner of the triangle. it hovered for about 30 seconds and then took off into the clouds at incredible speed maintaining the same triangular shape. it illuminated a cloud as it passed through it. also, a neighbors dog started barking before i had noticed the orbs. very creepy
content.summary: Three green glowing orbs in the shape of a triangle hovered

content.detailedDescription: Heard very loud metallic noise resonating from forest above ruedi res. got audio recording of it. sheriff's office has no idea what it could be.
content.summary: Heard metallic pulse/hum lasting 4+ hours in national forest land, up near ruedi res.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i saw a bright blue light moving fast to the south then changed direction and went north without stopping or turning. it then dated around in random directions finally going east till it went out of sight over a hill. it then came back west into view again and moved around and discharged what appeared like plasma.  then it flew east and vanished over the horizon again.  it was moving at incredibly high speed and made changes in direction that no plane or chopper could. and the bright blue was led like.  extremely bright. the flight path for planes heading to lindberg field (san diego international airport) is south of the area the object was over so we know it wasn't a jet as we see them all the time.
content.summary: Saw a bright blue light moving south then north at high speed. it moved around at high speed then went east over the horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a yellow orange ball of light drop from the sky, i would have disregarded it as a shooting star but then there were four planes , followed by a fifth and a sixth...I live way out in the country and this has never happened before. too many planes suddenly heading in the exact same position as the thing that fell, and it fell slowly.
the object disappeared before it reached the horizon , the planes must have been tracking it due to their almost instant appearance
content.summary: I saw an oranage yellow ball drop slowly from about 35 degrees to just above the hirizon where it simply vanished, i would have disregareded it as a shooting star , but suddenly there were four planes in the sky going in the same direction, the 5 and then

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba tomando fotograf����a panor����micas y cuando chequeo las fotograf����as desde la c����mara  kodak z650 me percato del objeto.
la sensaci����n fue de sorpresa.
content.summary: Un objeto no identificado con extraã±a forma

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving a car by the shore, in a time that the shores of recreio dos bandeirantes in rio de janeiro was almost a deserted place back in 1979.
... my friend spotted what looked like a star moving too fast in several directions. i pulled over, and we kept watching it move to the mountains and all the way to the sea in seconds.

the weirdest part: my friend and i started calling it and the star-shaped ufo not only slowed down but changed into "something" with tiny lights, until it slowly approached and passed above us, still very high up in the sky. we could both see its triangular shape and lights on its edges and one apparently in the middle of the triangle.
about the sound that it left: a very pleasing and soothing sound, which my friend and i simultaneously described as calming. i'll never forget that sound in my life. it lasted about 8 seconds, but the sound was unforgettable (granted, i do have a good memory for sounds).

another detail: possibly a minute after it passed right above us, still very high, another car pulled over, and questioned what we were doing there. we immediately replied, pointing to the ufo. they looked, but only believed it when the ufo turned into a red ball; it lowered a bit more, and it seemed that it was coming in our direction. but it didn't take long for what looked like a red ball to turn into other colors again. then it flew all the way up and continued to move like it had when we first spotted it: very fast, up and down, and to the sides.

my feelings: fear combined with self-control and peace (even though i'm usually very emotional -- i don't know how i managed to stand still during those moments). with my fingers, i made the sign of number 8 and a triangle, and placed my hands on my forehead ( i was trying to convey friendliness). while it was approaching and passing right above us, i stood still repeating: "peace, friends, peace, friends." however, my friend seemed to be in a frantic-like state. he rushed inside the beach and started screaming, fell on his knees and begged to be taken.

...As it moved up into the sky, we got into my car, and it once again transformed into a star. it moved up and down, back and forth, and seemed blended into the sky with the surrounding stars. 

one week later, when my friend and i went back to the same spot, we saw a small, soundless, roundish light above the ocean. it looked bright yellowish. we asked each other "do you think it's the ufo?" in unison. it glowed once, and very slowly the lights dimmed and it raised vertically, and very slowly, it moved above the sea, towards the end of the shore. we instantly jumped into my car and drove up to the end of the beach, but it remained hovering above the mountains, and i had no courage to continue to drive in that place. (i couldn't tell if it was a ufo, but it was certainly something unknown, trying to make itself known while in camouflage).


i'm writing about this event, even though it's been years, not only because of the event per se, which were remarkable, but also because again in 1982, when those shores were yet pretty deserted, a group of friends and i saw "something" (about 4 or 5 miles away) colorful above the sea, it was hovering. we observed it in awe, and watched what seemed like a tiny light coming out of it and going into the sea.

i believe that among the shores of "barra da tijuca" "recreio dos bandeirantes and "grumary" ( in rio de janeiro- rj, brazil) there was something going on, at least until the beginning of the eighties, when these areas were deserted places.

i know it's been a long time, but who cares about time, when we have quantum physics proving us that time is not linear?

thank you for your attention,
best regards,

j. zanini
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Puzzling

content.detailedDescription:
Good friday last year 2013 i experienced a sighting and filed report w/mufgon. 

marco island, fl
march 31, 2014 the ufo sighting was entirely different. i was just star-gazing and not expecting to see anything. i spoke with the individual who was assigned to review and communicate the sighting of 2013. i was encouraged keep looking around same time of month in 2014 so i did.  while looking up from the parking lot i was totally in awe when i found myself watching one beautiful red-orange with maybe a hint of gold moving by and at a consistent speed. i actually yelled "look, look"! as my companion looked up she too was in awe of the red-orange-colors and the beauty of the object. it was behind the building and then gone. please let me know if there were any other sightings. thank you.
content.summary: Looked up suddenly in sky in front of me .  one - 1  red-orange  object going by

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the moon as i was exiting walt whitman mall by brooks brothers. all of a sudden i see this black craft fly right underneath the moon. it was black, i thought it was a chemical plane, because it was leaving a trail of exhaust. but the exhaust quickly disappeared, as did the black craft. but, i took a picture of it with my iphone 5s, before it had a chance to disappear !
content.summary: I was looking up at the moon & saw a black craft flying right underneath moon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding home with my mother and we saw a bright light anywere between 
100 or 250 feet away above a set of trees in a pasture right of the side of the  road we stoped in the middle of our street and looked and listend but it was compleatle siolent it was way to big to have been something from our millitarey and be that quiet we hoped into the car and drove home.
content.summary: Riding home saw really bright light over some trees got out did not hear anything

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to record the sky on my laptop so that i could slow the real time and go over it. to my surprise i found alot more than i barganed for.I didnt notice it until i slowed the video down to 0.125x i thought it was a bird. the ufos were every were scattered threw the sky also i have multipule videos of the crafts over diffrent views of the house. in normal and edge detector.I was very excited that i actually caught somthing like this way better than any video i ever seen. the object just vanished into thin air . it came back later tho a few times . and i have those recordings also . i would just like someone to examin the videos and prove me wrong. i have the origanal videos on my laptop . i also recoreded and edited them on the same laptop . i had to borrow a friends computer to post this but i have the evidence if anyone wants to see it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Disc orbs mother ship moving around

content.detailedDescription: My aunt and i were driving home after a late dinner and i noticed what i thought to be a very bright large star which i had never noticed before . i looked at it for a minute mesmerized by this new found sight then it moved quickly but erraticly in the sky then it started getting closer to the horizon following in the same direction as we were going. then after a few minutes it disappeared from view as if it went invisible.
content.summary: In sky following us then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
when this sighting took place is not very specific in my memory, i feel
 it was mid october or early november of 1981 or
 1982. at that time in my life, i 
owned and operated a taxi cab in the city of philadelphia, pennsylvania. at
 around 3:00
 am a gentleman engaged me to transport him to the sheraton hotel
 in valley forge,about a 25 mile trip, we agreed on the
 price, then drove him 
there. after dropping him off i looked at my watch to note thefare and time
 in my trip log, it was
 around 3:25 am. my day driver started at 5:00 am, he 
lived on the other side of the city, which gave me some time before i
 had to 
pick him up. i decided to stop and buy a take out coffee, then drive to his
house. the quickest way to the city is
 on route 76 east, (schuylkill
 expressway). somewhere between conshohocken and the belmont exits i noticed a 
very bright
 light in the northeastern sky that seemed to be floating in one spot. i thought whyis a traffic helicopter out this early
 in the morning, 
maybe a bad accident in front of me? i called on the cb radio and asked if a traffic 
jam was down the road,
 a truck driver answered me and said he didn't hear of 
any, i then found out he was behind me about 1/4 mile. as i got
 closer to the 
light i slowed down to get a better look at it, (about 45 mph) now i could 
see smaller lights around the
 bottom of this craft, flashing green, blue,
red. i asked the truck driver if he saw the bright light out his left hand
 
window.
 then he told me he was looking at a very bright disk with little lights 
flashing on the bottom. as i neared the
 area of the light i pulled over on 
the shoulder of the highway, just below and south of it.I was just above the speing
 garden street exit, my position was south and across from the philadelphia art musuam almost under a stone railroad btidge.  
 just then a truck 
passed me, and asked me on the cb if i was ok. i told him yes and asked if he 
would report what we were
 seeing. "no way!" was his answer.

 when i rolled down my window to hear the whir of the rotor blades, it 
then hit me that
 there wasn't any noise coming from this object. for some 
reason i picked up the spot light i use to locate house numbers,
 flashing it 
at the ufo, the craft flashed back from a smaller light in the very bottom 
center. it was mimicking me, ok
 lets try something here, flashing in morse
code the word "hi" it flashed back "hi". it must be a program to repeat back 
to
 the sender. so then i flashed "my name is chalie". what i expected to receive 
and didn't is why i'll remember this for the
 rest of my life. they 
transmitted back to me "my name is zon". 

now i can find out where they are from, looking back at the
 object it was 
gone! i scanned the sky and never saw it again. stunned and shaking i used 
the mobile phone to report what
 just happened. three days later two men from 
the government, (their words) interviewed me and told me someone would be
 
calling me to check on my sighting. to this day no one has ever called or
 asked about it.
content.summary: Signeld bright ball in morse code, it answered back in morse code.
